memberdef.name: CHECK
memberdef.initializer: do { \ const bool result = ARG; \ if( ! result ) { \ MSG_ERROR( APP_NAME << "FAILED to execute" <<#ARG); \ return EXIT_FAILURE; \ } \ } while( false )

memberdef.name: printUsage
memberdef.initializer: MSG_ERROR( "Usage: [--file/-f /path/to/input/file] [--runno/-r run number] [--corr/c correlationModel] " \ << "[--type/-t FullSim/AtlFast2] [--useDefaults/-d]" << ARG );
